snippet: A caseworker at the New York City’s Human Resources Administration agreed to resign in a settlement after asking a welfare recipient whose benefits he was seeing to take care of his ferret.
abstract: New York City Human Resources Administration fires caseworker Kempe Hope for asking a welfare recipient, whose benefits Hope was overseeing, to take care of his pet ferret in exchange for cash.
lead_paragraph: A caseworker at the New York City’s Human Resources Administration agreed to resign in a settlement after asking a welfare recipient whose benefits he was seeing to take care of his ferret.

headline.seo: City Employee Resigns, and His Ferret May Be to Blame
headline.main: Caseworker Hires Client as Pet-Sitter. City Finds It Too Weaselly.
